name: google_maps_data_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool google_search_2.
Tool description: Serpdog(https://serpdog.io) is a Google Search API that allows you to access Google Search Results in real time. It solves the problem of proxies and captchas for a smooth scraping journey. Serpdog supports results in both HTML and JSON format.

Get your free trial by registering at https://api.serpdog.io

If you want to buy our plan, I recommend you to please visit https://serpdog.io/pricing for more information. 
API description: Fetches the JSON results of the data ID for a specific place using the Google Maps API via RapidAPI.

query.description: The query string used to search for the place.

gl.description: The geographical location from which to execute the query. Defaults to 'us'.
